ChangeList.Description: Removed the **includeDevices** property from the [conditionalAccessDevices](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessDevices?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **excludeDevices** property from the [conditionalAccessDevices](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessDevices?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Changed the **users** property in the [conditionalAccessConditionSet](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessConditionSet?view=graph-rest-beta) resource from optional to required.
Removed the **clientApplications** property from the [conditionalAccessConditionSet](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessConditionSet?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **authenticationContextClassReferences** relationship from the [conditionalAccessRoot](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **continuousAccessEvaluationPolicy** relationship from the [identityContainer](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/identityContainer?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
